pages.text: $(li)The Wand of Freezing is a weapon that can't be used to attack directly.$(br)$(li)First you have to right click while you are pointing your target.$(br)$(li)Then a couple of ice blocks will appear on top of your target.

$(li)Finally, you have to right click again to release the ice block.$(br)$(li)This block will hurt the creature that hits and inflicts the Frostbite effect.$(br)$(li)This effect slows and damage it every continuously from time to time until the effect ends.$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:illagers/iceologer)Iceologers$(/l) may drop the Wand of Freezing on death.
